abstract: Thank you for live streaming last night Jay. I got the notification when I awoke suddenly at 4am with a bad feeling, and I was glad to have learned about it from you before anyone else here was even awake. I could tell it was painful for everyone, it was painful for even me. This video was a little sad to watch, knowing what was about to happen and what the next video will include :(
Love the new vid. Australia is sorry to hear about the Notre Dame.
Just gotta say I’m LOVING this series. You’re awesome I just love watching you go about your day and it really comes through just how much you love this city.
